items.quote: When you want something, the whole universe conspires in order for you to achieve it.
A woman must continually watch herself. She is almost continually accompanied by her own image of herself.
The history of art deals with innovators and innovations that won organizational victories.
Works work when they inform vision; inform not by supplying information but by forming or reforming or transforming vision.
Art is whatever you can get away with.
I have nothing to say and I’m saying it.
Every time I have had a problem, I have confronted it with the ax of art.
Art is either plagiarism or revolution.
Art should comfort the disturbed and disturb the comfortable.
Each of us has a spark, and we’ve all got to account for what we do with it.
